nodes.text: @RdotSpoon @afrobella That’s what makes me mad. Watching them debate how terrible it is to tattoo black skin, right in front of the Black client. 😡
@afrobella i skipped to season 8 and 11 and they are so fucked up to the Black canvases, in front of them. its wild.
@JodieSlaughter Nikki's a racist full stop. the way she goes after Bone Face is obvious.
@RdotSpoon She went after him SO hard, it was gross.

@RdotSpoon @miggytheo I watched the whole show because I started hyperfixating on it and couldn’t stop myself, even though it was racist (and sexist) as FUCK and such competitive shows give me really bad secondhand embarrassment 😅
@RdotSpoon @miggytheo WAIT i mean, I didn’t watch the whole thing, I watched all of both seasons that are on Netflix
I don't know I'd forgotten how racist Ink Master is but eeeeyikes. I wish black people would stop volunteering to be human canvases on this show.
@RdotSpoon My sister and I were watching this a lot and she had to take a hard stop with all the racism and misogyny and can’t say I blame her! 😔
@RdotSpoon yep, they get upset if they have a Black canvas and it's upsetting every time.
@RdotSpoon Tell me why I'm watching S8 for the first time and JUST saw this ep and was so disgusted like...
Nikki Simpson saying on camera how shitty a tattoo is gonna be just cause the human canvas is Black is just... https://t.co/tPSjQUhoz9

@RdotSpoon I had to quit watching that show. Super racist in all kinds of ways. I got so mad and never turned back at the end of Season 2 when that guy tattooed that volunteer's whole back with something she would never want
